column1: 721916,Streetsweeper Operator,,"Drive mobile plants on roads or work sites
column3: Operate cleaning or polishing equipment for floors and other surfaces
column5: Maintain equipment or systems to ensure proper functioning
column7: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column19: Monitor work areas or procedures to ensure compliance with safety procedures
column21: Drive vehicles to, or at, work sites
